decisions.decision: Goal for this ErgoHack was to address performance factor by pricing options directly on-chain using the Black-Scholes options pricing model
decisions.speaker: Quokka
decisions.context: To tackle performance issues that prevent DeFi options from capturing market share
decisions.quote: So our goal for this ErgoHack was to address this particular factor, performance. Specifically, our goal was to price options directly on-chain using the Black-Scholes options pricing model.

decisions.decision: For the ErgoHack, created pools that only support one strike price and expiration
decisions.speaker: Quokka
decisions.quote: For the ErgoHack, we created pools that only support one strike price and expiration.

decisions.decision: Decided to leave Delta and Vega neutral pools for a future version after refactoring the code
decisions.speaker: Quokka
decisions.context: Was close to being built but needs more work
decisions.quote: This is something that we were close to having built into option pools, but we decided to leave this for a future version after we refactor the code a bit.

commitments.commitment: After cleaning up code and auditing, will tackle risk issues
commitments.quote: After we clean up the code and audit things, we'll be able to tackle risk.

commitments.commitment: In future versions, can integrate with DuckPools for liquidity
commitments.quote: And in future versions, we can integrate with DuckPools for liquidity.
